pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======sktutor=======.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/sktutor.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sktutor.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/dfd/sktutor.svg :target: https://app.travis-ci.com/github/dfd/sktutor.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/sktutor/badge/?version=latest :target: https://sktutor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation Status.. image:: https://codecov.io/gh/dfd/sktutor/branch/master/graph/badge.svg :target: https://codecov.io/gh/dfd/sktutor :alt: Code Coverage Statussktutor helps your machines learn.* Free software: BSD license* Documentation: https://sktutor.readthedocs.io.Features--------* TODOCredits---------This package was created with Cookiecutter_ and the `audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage`_ project template... _Cookiecutter: https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter.. _`audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage`: https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter-pypackage=======History=======0.1.0 (2017-05-14)------------------* First release on PyPI.
